name: Those Humans!
description:
A game made for the Mashup Game Jam 2 

Those Humans have risen from the dead in order to steal his veggies once again. It won't be so easy, this time though... Not as long as he has his chain/veggie gun with him.

------CONTROLS-----

- Left mouse click to start moving with your chaingun, that's all

- Try to get of from the ground, get some speed while you are on the air, and then fall with speed on your enemies, kill all of them as fast as you can
